title: About me
intro: Hello! I'm Diogo Moreira. I live in Brazil and currently making plans to see the world.
hobbies: I enjoy playing video games, particularly role-playing games. I also enjoy reading, watching anime, TV series and movies, especially drama and those related to science fiction and fantasy themes. Take a look at some of the things I'm into lately here.
